about_the_game:
Crashed is a third-person stealth adventure where you play as B.O.B. After his spaceship collided with an asteroid, he crash-lands on the quirky world of SnamSam. Upon waking, B.O.B. discovers that several parts of his ship have been looted by the local inhabitants, the Snailmen!

Your mission? Reassemble the scattered pieces of your spaceship and escape!

Infiltrate the Facility

Embark on a daring quest through the Snailmen’s labyrinthine facility. Navigate restricted areas brimming with patrolling guards and security cameras that track your every move. Keep out of sight to avoid detection or risk having nearby guards hunt you down. The goal is simple: retrieve your spaceship parts hidden deep the facility and escape. Utilize creative strategies, time your movement, and exploit shortcuts to outwit the Snailmen and slip through their defenses.

Use Your Head...

Take out Snailmen guards with B.O.B.’s detachable head! Launch it at unsuspecting guards from behind to knock their heads clean off, creating comedic chaos. Steal a guard’s head to open doors leading to restricted areas or unlock special shortcuts. But beware—the guards won’t give up their heads without a fight and will relentlessly chase you to get them back.

Don’t worry—the Snailmen are a hardy bunch! Losing their heads is just a temporary inconvenience, and they’ll pop them right back on and keep going.

Prepare for an unforgettable adventure where your head is your greatest weapon. Rebuild your ship, outwit the Snailmen, and escape SnamSam—if you can!
